basis_func.py Basis Functions Module¶

Basis functions evaluation module.

basis_func.lin_p1(s, eval_p)¶

Linear shape function on lines, namely p1.

Input:

s : one dimensional array of line vertices coords.

exal_p: (n,1) array of the n evaluation points.

Output:

a_j : the two derivatives.

phi : (n,2) array of the two shape funtions ath the n eval points.

omega : the line length.

basis_func.tri_p1(x, y, eval_p)¶

Linear shape function on triangles, namely p1.

Input:

x : one dimensional array of triangle vertices x coords.

y : one dimensional array of triangle vertices y coords.

eval_p: (n,2) array of the n evaluation points. first
column indicates x-coord, second y-coord.

Output:

dx_phi : the three x-derivatives.

dy_phi : the three y-derivatives.

phi : (n,3) array of the three shape funtions ath the n eval points.

surf_e : the triangle area.
